backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling authorization, user profiles, expense records, Presentbin imports, and timestamp‑sorted storage with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing authentication‑related features, affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten short summaries for all major frontend files including auth, expenses, utilities, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying them to core elements.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app shell handling Internet Identity auth, loading states, error display, and conditional profile setup before rendering the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthErrorBa: UI alert component for displaying authentication errors with optional dismiss button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow, showing inline errors, and clearing state on retries.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first‑time profile setup that collects a user name and submits it through the profile API.
frontend/src/components/expenses/Expense: Displays a table of expenses with loading and empty states, and supports deleting individual records via a confirmation dialog.
Calculates and shows total expenses grouped by currency with a loading and empty state.
frontend/src/components/expenses/ManualE: Provides a form for manually adding expenses, including amount, currency, category, notes, and date/time.
frontend/src/components/import/Presentbi: Allows pasting or uploading Presentbin JSON data, parses it, previews transactions, and imports them via mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useExpenses.ts: Defines hooks for fetching, adding, deleting, and importing expenses through the backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login/logout controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the caller’s user profile using the backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the expense dashboard with tabs for today, day, month, and import views using fetched and filtered expenses.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Provides date formatting and utilities for computing day/month ranges and filtering expenses by timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/fingerprint.ts: Generates a deterministic string fingerprint for transactions using a simple hash.
frontend/src/utils/presentbinParser.ts: Parses and validates Presentbin JSON transactions, converts dates, and adds fingerprints.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, issues, and architectural context.
